backend/main.mo: Placeholder Motoko actor with no backend logic, as deployment workflow is handled externally.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing addition of locally stored product logo assets referenced in ProductGrid.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of summaries for all major frontend components, hooks, styles, and deployment scripts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide detailing IC deployment prerequisites, naming rules, steps, and common issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/google81cfc97330838765.h: Google site verification file for domain ownership validation.
Node script running TypeScript checking and Vite build with colored diagnostic output.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy.sh: Shell script automating deployment retries with name validation, cleanup, and error guidance.
frontend/scripts/validate-deploy-names.m: Node script validating IC canister naming rules in dfx.json and canister_ids.json.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring search, cart, layout sections, theming, and error boundary.
UI component showing actionable error messages with retry buttons.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches errors and displays ActionableError with refresh option.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slideâ€‘in cart drawer showing items, totals, and a WhatsApp checkout flow with item removal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, links, social icons, and a dynamic year plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, search input, and cart button showing item count badge.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, and a button scrolling to products.
frontend/src/components/NoticeBar.tsx: Scrolling marquee bar displaying service time notices.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card with image handling, quantity controls, price actions, and WhatsApp interactions.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Grid filtering and displaying product cards from a predefined product list.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsSection.t: Customer reviews list with a form to submit new reviews and star ratings.
frontend/src/components/TrustSection.tsx: Trust badge section highlighting secure checkout with payment method icons.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp button linking to customer support chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines placeholder query logic using the actor, currently returning null until backend calls are added.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and utility animations including marquee and icon display rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, radius, and plugins like typography and container queries.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related tooling with module resolution and composite build options.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config for React with path aliases, chunk splitting, dev server proxy, and optimization settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and deployment issues for the storefront system.
